FuncDef: This command specifies the export policy to control MVPN routes exported from the local VRF to other VRFs on the same or remote PE routers.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use unicast VRF export policy for the MVPN.

The route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long). Allowed values are any string up to 255 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes.

The route policy name (up to 64 characters long) or a policy logical expression (up to 255 characters long). Allowed values are any string up to 64 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes. Up to 14 policies can be specified in a single statement.
